name: Reflex Master Pro
description:
THIS IS A PAID VERSION OF THE GAME "REFLEX MASTER"

FREE VERSION WILL BE POSTED ON MY PROFILE!

Reflex Master is a rhythm-based game that tests the reflections of even the most experienced players.

Get through all levels in Reflex Master, each with its own soundtrack. Difficulty increases, but its your aim to avoid collision with any of the hundreds of obstacles put in your way. Controls are simple. But you'll need a lot of practice in order to truly dominate..

With its catchy tunes and frenetic gameplay, Reflex Master ranks among top tier games like Geometry Dash. But it offers a twist on typical gameplay, this time around you have to really get into the groove of the music to actually make it to the end of each level.
